metadata.title: CVE-2023-45364 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in includes/page/Article.php in MediaWiki 1.36.xthrough 1.39.x before 1.39.5 and 1.40.x before 1.40.1. Deleted revisionexistence is leaked due to incorrect permissions being checked. Thisreveals that a given revision ID belonged to the given page title, and itstimestamp, both of which are not supposed to be public information.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
